Installation via Updatesite

The plugin can be installed via the Update Manager using the following updatesite:

http://pulse00.github.com/p2/

Important

At the moment you'll need to install the PHP Development Tools from this updatesite (development build), not the one built-in with eclipse. The Symfony plugin will NOT work with the current stable PHP Development tools.

Usage

For new Symfony projects you can simply use the "New Symfony Project" wizard which sets up the project correctly.

To make your existing PHP projects Symfony aware, add the SymfonyNature by right-clicking on the project in the PHP explorer -> Symfony -> Add/Remove Symfony Nature. This will add the Symfony project nature and trigger the indexing mechanism of DLTK/PDT/Symfony (see the status bar at the bottom).

The plugin indexes all PHP, XML and YML files which are on the PHP buildpath. To ensure it can find all relevant sources, your buildpath should look like this ( screenshot from the Symfony Standard Edition):

Note that the app/cache and vendor/...GeneratorBundle.../skeleton folders are excluded to avoid build errors(skeleton) and duplicate codeassist entries (cache)
